channel.title: Class Suggestion - Courier / Forger
channel.description:
[quote] <big>[color=blue]**Courier**[/color]<big>
[color=blue]**Blue Dragon Social**[/color]
**Paper Work(Passive)** - Immune to most occupation and redirection. This passive is keep even if your class change.
**Paper Madness(Passive)** - You will prevent the first attempt attack on you. You will known if you used this passive.
**Log Reader(Day)** - You will recieve a copy of target first page Log Book at the start of the night. 3 Use.
**Log Reminder(Night)** - Visit the target, you will know what they have added into their Log Book at the end of the night. Unlimited Use. You will receive what they added during that night,
**Secret Note(Night)** - See a target Deathnote. 1 Use
*Your objects is to defeat the [color=purple]Unseen[/color] and [color=red]Cult[/color] or any **Neutral** that seek to your harm.* [/quote]
[quote] <big>[color=purple]**Forger**[/color]<big>
[color=purple]**Unseen Social**[/color] **Paper Work(Passive)** - Immune to most occupation and redirection at night. You will keep this passive even if your class changed.
**Paper Disguise(Passive)** - If you die at night then you will show up as [color=blue]**Courier**[/color]
**Log Checker(Day)** - You and Unseen will recieve a copy of target first page Log Book at the start of the night. 2 Use.
**Note Checker(Night)** - Get a player Private Note. 2 Use
**Replace (Night)** - If the target die tonight, he will appear as chosen class and will have their log writen by you (Start writing after choosing target.). 2 Use. Regain an use if target didnt die.
*Your objects is to defeat the [color=blue]Blue Dragon[/color] or any **Neutral** that seek to your harm.* [/quote]

item.description:
SweetyCake:

Log Reader(Day) - You will recieve a copy of target first page Log Book at the start of the night. 3 Use.

item.title: Class Suggestion - Courier / Forger
item.dc:creator: SimpleValueDeskFan
item.description:
SweetyCake:

Log Reader(Day) - You will recieve a copy of target Log Book at the start of the night. 3 Use.

I dunno, I never really like the idea of Blue Dragon reading logs, seemed op as it limits evils information

SweetyCake:

Log Reminder(Night) - Visit the target, you will know what they have added into their Log Book at the end of the night. Unlimited Use

So like
“Link 7 - He claims Drunk” ?

SweetyCake:

Secret Note(Night) - See a target Deathnote. 2 Use

seems, sorta useless but so strong at the same time
Would encourage Killers to not use DN

SweetyCake:

Paper Disguise(Passive) - If you die at night then you will show up as Courier

SweetyCake:

Replace (Night) - If the target die tonight, he will appear as chosen class and will have their log writen by you (Start writing after choosing target.). 2 Use. Regain an use if target didnt die.

I love this Idea and I love you

Read full topic

item.title: Class Suggestion - Courier / Forger
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
I don’t think many of us were fans of a “read logs as BD” class from the last time. It basically turns being evil into a game of stupid luck. (Instead of keeping 2 or 3 logs and organically picking the one that works best based on the classes that have died. instead you pretty much have to blindly chose a class n1 out of a hat and pray everything works). As changing your story is a good way to get caught.

Death note checking also… only encourages evils not to use death notes. Turns what is currently 90% used for fun, into a way to lose the game if you use it.

Read full topic

item.title: Class Suggestion - Courier / Forger
item.dc:creator: SweetyCake
item.description:
Courier

Blue Dragon Social

Paper Work(Passive) - Immune to most occupation and redirection. This passive is keep even if your class change.

Paper Madness(Passive) - You will prevent the first attempt attack on you. You will known if you used this passive.

Log Reader(Day) - You will recieve a copy of target first page Log Book at the start of the night. 3 Use.

Log Reminder(Night) - Visit the target, you will know what they have added into their Log Book at the end of the night. Unlimited Use. You will receive what they added during that night,

Secret Note(Night) - See a target Deathnote. 1 Use

Your objects is to defeat the Unseen and Cult or any Neutral that seek to your harm.

Forger

Unseen Social
Paper Work(Passive) - Immune to most occupation and redirection at night. You will keep this passive even if your class changed.

Paper Disguise(Passive) - If you die at night then you will show up as Courier

Log Checker(Day) - You and Unseen will recieve a copy of target first page Log Book at the start of the night. 2 Use.

Note Checker(Night) - Get a player Private Note. 2 Use

Replace (Night) - If the target die tonight, he will appear as chosen class and will have their log writen by you (Start writing after choosing target.). 2 Use. Regain an use if target didnt die.

Your objects is to defeat the Blue Dragon or any Neutral that seek to your harm.

Read full topic
